content: **crocheted top in drops paris the piece is worked in squares sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-892 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-200-200-250-250-250 g colour 17 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 05 lilac 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 100 light wash 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 21 mint green 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 62 sea green 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 02 light turquoise 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 09 royal blue 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 11 opal green 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 31 purple 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 39 wasabi 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 61 lime 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 71 tangerine **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 mm **crochet gauge** 1 square measures approx 11 x 11 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
